languages.text: Владайм, прежде сторонившийся лиц, подозреваемых в ереси, и сделок с порченным товаром, со временем сменил свое отношение. Корабли Миссии доставляли на миры не только запретные грузы, но и подозрительных людей, сжимавших обтянутые странной кожей книги. Не всем это было по нраву, но никто не рисковал оспорить приказы устрашающего Вакемо.

Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.
languages.original_text: Владайм, прежде сторонившийся лиц, подозреваемых в ереси, и сделок с порченным товаром, со временем сменил свое отношение. Корабли Миссии доставляли на миры не только запретные грузы, но и подозрительных людей, сжимавших обтянутые странной кожей книги. Не всем это было по нраву, но никто не рисковал оспорить приказы устрашающего Вакемо.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym, who formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and the deals with corrupted goods, with time, changed his mind. The ships of the Mission not only brought forbidden goods to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious folk, clutching books bound in strange skin. Not everybody liked it, yet nobody was brave enough to risk challenging the orders of terrifying Vackemo.

Not everybody liked it, yet nobody was brave enough to risk challenging the orders of terrifying Vackemo.

Not everybody liked it, but nobody was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

Not everybody liked it, but nobody was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

languages.text: 弗拉迪姆曾与那些涉嫌异端和腐化物品的人保持距离，但随着时间的推移，他改变了主意。如今，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的舰船不仅将违禁品运送到诸多世界，还会协助转运一部分可疑人士，他们身上都带着用奇怪兽皮装订的书籍。不是每个人都喜欢干这种脏活，但没人敢挑战弗拉魔这个暴君的命令。
languages.original_text: Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆曾与那些涉嫌异端和腐化物品的人保持距离，但随着时间的推移，他改变了主意。如今，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的舰船不仅将违禁品运送到诸多世界，还会协助转运一部分可疑人士，他们身上都带着用奇怪兽皮装订的书籍。不是每个人都喜欢干这种脏活，但没人敢挑战弗拉魔这个暴君的命令。

languages.text: Vladaym hatte zuvor immer Abstand zu allen gehalten, die der Ketzerei und des Handels mit verderbten Waren verdächtigt wurden. Doch mit der Zeit änderte er seinen Standpunkt. Die Schiffe der Mission brauchten nicht nur Schmuggelware auf verschiedene Welten, sondern transportieren auch verdächtige Personen, die Bücher mit einem merkwürdigen Einband bei sich trugen. Nicht jedem gefiel das, doch niemand war mutig genug, die Befehle des furchterregenden Vackemo zu hinterfragen.
languages.original_text: Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym hatte zuvor immer Abstand zu allen gehalten, die der Ketzerei und des Handels mit verderbten Waren verdächtigt wurden. Doch mit der Zeit änderte er seinen Standpunkt. Die Schiffe der Mission brauchten nicht nur Schmuggelware auf verschiedene Welten, sondern transportieren auch verdächtige Personen, die Bücher mit einem merkwürdigen Einband bei sich trugen. Nicht jedem gefiel das, doch niemand war mutig genug, die Befehle des furchterregenden Vackemo zu hinterfragen.

languages.text: Vladaym, qui avait longtemps pris soin de rester à l'écart des individus soupçonnés d'hérésie et du trafic de marchandises corrompues, finit par changer d'avis. En plus d'acheminer de la contrebande jusqu'à différents mondes, les vaisseaux de la Mission transportaient également des individus suspects tenant des livres reliés dans un cuir étrange. Si cela ne plaisait pas à tout le monde, personne n'osait aller à l'encontre des ordres du terrifiant Vackemo.
languages.original_text: Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym, qui avait longtemps pris soin de rester à l'écart des individus soupçonnés d'hérésie et du trafic de marchandises corrompues, finit par changer d'avis. En plus d’acheminer de la contrebande jusqu’à différents mondes, les vaisseaux de la Mission transportaient également des individus suspects tenant des livres reliés dans un cuir étrange. Cela ne plaisait pas à tout le monde, mais personne n'osait aller à l'encontre des ordres du terrifiant Vackemo.

languages.text: Vladaym, que antaño se alejaba de los sospechosos de herejía y de comerciar con mercancía corrupta, cambió de mentalidad con el tiempo. Las naves de la misión no solo transportaron contrabando a varios mundos, sino también personas sospechosas que aferraban libros encuadernados con una piel extraña. No a todo el mundo le gustó el cambio, pero nadie se atrevía a desafiar las órdenes del aterrador Vackemo.
languages.original_text: Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym, que antaño se alejaba de los sospechosos de herejía y de comerciar con mercancía corrupta, cambió de mentalidad con el tiempo. Las naves de la misión no solo transportaron contrabando a varios mundos, sino también personas sospechosas que aferraban libros encuadernados con una piel extraña. No a todo el mundo le gustó el cambio, pero nadie se atrevía a desafiar las órdenes del aterrador Vackemo.

languages.text: ヴラダイムは、かつては異端と疑われた者や汚染された品物を扱う者には近寄らなかったが、時が経つにつれて考えを変えた。聖務団の船は異世界に密輸品を運ぶだけでなく、奇妙な皮に綴じられた書物を握りしめた不審者を移送した。誰もがそれを好んだわけではなかったが、恐ろしいヴァッケモの命令に挑戦する勇気ある者はいなかった。
languages.original_text: Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

traits.locale_text: ヴラダイムは、かつては異端と疑われた者や汚染された品物を扱う者には近寄らなかったが、時が経つにつれて考えを変えた。聖務団の船は異世界に密輸品を運ぶだけでなく、奇妙な皮に綴じられた書物を握りしめた不審者を移送した。誰もがそれを好んだわけではなかったが、恐ろしいヴァッケモの命令に挑戦する勇気ある者はいなかった。

languages.text: Eskiden kâfirlik şüphesi olanlarla ve yoz ürün ticareti yapmaktan uzak duran Vladaym, zaman içerisinde fikrini değiştirdi. Misyon gemileri yalnızca farklı dünyalardan kaçak mal getirmekle kalmıyor, aynı zamanda tuhaf derilere sarılı kitaplarla dolaşan şüpheli kişiler de taşıyordu. Bu durumdan hoşnut olmayanlar olsa da kimse Vackemo'nun emirlerine karşı gelmeye cesaret edemiyordu.
languages.original_text: Vladaym, who had formerly stayed clear of those suspected of heresy and dealings with corrupted goods, changed his mind with time. The Mission's ships not only brought contraband to different worlds, but they also transferred suspicious individuals clutching books bound in strange hide. Not everyone liked it, but no one was brave enough to challenge the orders of the terrifying Vackemo.

traits.locale_text: Eskiden kâfirlik şüphesi olanlarla ve yozlaşmış ürünlerle iş yapmaktan uzak duran Vladaym, zaman içerisinde fikrini değiştirdi. Misyon'unun gemileri yalnızca farklı dünyalardan kaçak mal getirmekle kalmıyor, aynı zamanda tuhaf derilere sarılı kitaplarla dolaşan şüpheli kişiler de taşıyorlardı. Bu durumdan herkes hoşnut değildi ancak kimse Vackemo'nun dehşeti karşısında emirlere karşı gelme cesaretini kendinde görmüyordu.
